groups.name: blog-system
groups.description: Configuration Item Group of Personal Blog System.

groups.name: blog-system.index-page
groups.description: information which will be displayed in the welcome page.

properties.name: blog-system.markdown-file-base
properties.description: git work dir where you markdown blogs locate,make sure that you have full permission of this dir.

properties.name: blog-system.link-accessibility-validator.enabled
properties.description: detect invalid link url (both interanl and external) periodically.

properties.name: blog-system.index-page.seo-keywords-zh
properties.description: 展示在首页的中文关键词
properties.defaultValue: 博客,个人博客,技术博客

properties.name: blog-system.index-page.seo-keywords-en
properties.description: keywords displayed in meta tags of the welcome page

properties.name: blog-system.index-page.seo-descriptions
properties.description: descriptions for web page seo purpose.

properties.name: blog-system.page-view-times.sync-duration-seconds-threshold
properties.description: seconds-threshold that a cached visited times will be persistent asynchronously

properties.name: blog-system.seo.site-map.store-dir
properties.description: dir where site map of blog system locates

properties.name: blog-system.blog-document-crud-admin.user-name
properties.description: user name who have permission to do crud operations.

properties.name: blog-system.blog-document-crud-admin.user-password
properties.description: user password to do crud operations.

properties.name: http.port
properties.description: when https is enabled,use this port to run http
